document.full_text: the crown prince of abu dhabi has hired the founder of private security firm blackwater worldwide to set up an 800-member battalion of foreign troops for the united arab emirates, the new york times reported on sunday.
document.title: blackwater founder builds foreign force in uae: report
lines_and_colors: the crown prince of abu dhabi has hired the founder of private security firm blackwater worldwide to set up an 800-member battalion of foreign troops for the united arab emirates, the new york times reported on sunday.
